text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yoo-hoo, Trainer☆ Do I have some lucky news for you today!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Believe it or not, there's going 
to be a collaboration campaign 
with Tokyo Mega Illumination!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, they'll be handing out 
Christmas presents every day…

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
…There will be events where we get to 
hype up the Christmas spirit…

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
…And you might even get items by 
tapping the small gift placed right here. 
Sounds like a whole lot of happy events 
are coming our way!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
So enjoy it with us♪ 
Rickey☆ Lucky☆ Merry Christmas☆
